long_description: This Voile Splitboard Binding Interface is made to work with a variety of factory-built splitboards. It includes all screw-mounted hardware for the touring and riding modes. Includes a pair of Universal Slider Tracks and Slider Pins to quickly move from touring to riding mode and back. Universal Slider Tracks accept almost all snowboard bindings on the market. This kit works with Burton, Jones, K2, LTB, Never Summer, Prior, Unity, Venture, Voile and Winterstick snowboards. Please note: this kit does not work when sawing your old board in half.
short_description: This Voile Splitboard Binding Interface is made to work with a variety of factory-built splitboards. It includes all screw-mounted hardware for the touring and riding modes.
